text: If they want peace, nations should avoid the pin-pricks that precede cannon shots.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

text: Peace is not an absence of war, it is a virtue, a state of mind, a disposition for benevolence, confidence, justice.
author: Baruch Spinoza

text: It is madness for sheep to talk peace with a wolf.
author: Thomas Fuller

text: I think it's naive to pray for world peace if we're not going to change the form in which we live.
author: Godfrey Reggio

text: Peace and justice are two sides of the same coin.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
